## Key Features in v2.2.3

### CLI JSON Output Support (BACKLOG-001)
- Added `--json` flag to 7 ticket commands
- Standard JSON response format with status, data, metadata
- Enables automated testing (unblocks 30+ integration tests)
- 100% backward compatible (opt-in only)

### GitHub Synchronous Operations (BACKLOG-002)
- Added `--wait` flag for synchronous GitHub operations
- Queue polling with configurable timeout (default: 30s)
- Returns actual issue IDs instead of queue IDs
- Unblocks 13 GitHub integration tests

### Integration Test Suite
- 40+ comprehensive tests for Linear and GitHub
- Test helpers: CLIHelper, MCPHelper
- Automatic cleanup and token validation
- 90%+ expected pass rate

### Documentation
- CLI_JSON_OUTPUT.md - Complete JSON format guide
- GITHUB_SYNC_OPERATIONS.md - Synchronous operations guide
- TEST_SUITE_FINAL_SUMMARY.md - Test suite documentation
- PRODUCT_BACKLOG_RECOMMENDATIONS.md - Future enhancements

## Known Issues

- **Status**: Deferred
- **Reason**: PyPI indexing delay (expected)
- **Impact**: Non-blocking, users can still install via pip
- **Resolution**: Will auto-retry after ~1-2 hours
